metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3824 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In PHP version 8.0.* before 8.0.30, 8.1.* before 8.1.22, and 8.2.* before 8.2.8, when loading phar file, while reading PHAR directory entries, insufficient length checking may lead to a stack buffer overflow, leading potentially to memory corruption or RCE.

notes.Note: sbeattie> PEAR issues should go against php-pear as of xenial

criterions.comment: php7.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
